text:
iDatalabs | Seattle | Full-time | Full Stack Engineer | Sales, Biz Dev | Competitive Salary + Equity

We mine and profile large amounts of publicly available data and apply data science / ML to build solutions that help with B2B Marketing and Sales. We are a small but fast growing team, looking for a full-stack engineer to work on all aspects of our stack. See details at https://angel.co/idatalabs/jobs/165016-full-stack-engineer

We are also looking for Biz Dev / SDR positions.

If interested, please reach out to lokesh at idatalabs.com.
